GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
net: Fix data-races around sysctl_devconf_inherit_init_net.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit bdb33552e663f2aafa2678684c9b665cfac3e246, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 856c395cfa63b94a1d8215182f0243c222f6f927. For more details please see the references link.
